projects.name: Taberna Precursor
projects.description: Taberna Precursor is a videogame news website written in spanish. Was developed with the latest technologies in web development wich provides a great performance and escalability.

projects.name: F1 Connect API
projects.description: F1 Connect Api is a free, easy-to-use api that is ready for development. Its modern and efficient design allows for a multitude of applications at once.

projects.name: BlocksUi
projects.description: BlocksUi is an open source component library made with React and CSS. It's available in NPM and has their own documentation page.

projects.name: Miaudle | Idle Game
projects.description: Miaudle is an incremental and clicker game where you collect adorable cats. You can use the cats you collect to purchase various upgrades, which will increase your cat generation rate per second.

projects.name: Ninja Path
projects.description: Ninja Path is a free URL shortener built with Astro and a database from Supabase. You can create your own URLs with one click.

projects.name: Your Own CV
projects.description: Your Own CV allows you to create your own resume in pdf format in just a few minutes.

projects.name: Pomodoro
functionalities: Toggle between dark and light themes
projects.description: The Pomodoro Timer is a productivity tool that helps users manage their work time effectively. This React-based application allows users to break down work into intervals, typically 25 minutes in length, separated by short breaks. With a clean and intuitive user interface.

projects.name: Timer
functionalities: Real-time clock based on your location and time zone
projects.description: A simple web application built with React and CSS that serves as a clock, stopwatch, and timer. You can also create custom timers.

projects.name: Currency Converter
functionalities: Real-time data based on an external API
Toggle option to switch between to currencies
projects.description: This is a simple Currency Converter web application built with React and native CSS. It allows users to convert between different currencies using real-time exchange rates fetched from a third-party API.

projects.name: F1 App
functionalities: Real-time data based on an external API
Results and points for the Drivers and Constructors championships
projects.description: A web application created using React and CSS that offers in-depth information on Formula 1 races, drivers, teams, and season statistics. Stay up-to-date with upcoming races and explore the rich history of Formula 1.

projects.name: Quiz Game
functionalities: Each question has been categorized by its difficulty
projects.description: This project is a quiz game developed in React using Vite and React Router. There are 20 questions in the game, and the player must choose the correct option from 4 possible choices for each question.

projects.name: Supermarket Service
functionalities: Database that is based on Supabase and has a personal API.
Search engine to find your products
Filtering is available for every category
projects.description: The Supermarket Service app is a powerful tool designed to streamline the shopping experience. Leveraging a robust API built on Supabase, this application provides effortless access to a wide range of product data. Enabling users to find desired products with ease by allowing them to browse, search, and apply filters.
